page.title: 14Media And Population.
page.content: 22 families have daily national newspapers, 10 families buy evening papers. Most families also receive a free local paper. 20 families purchase Sunday papers. Half the sample buy books from our school bookshop, 4 families use 2 other village shops. Every family has at least 1 radio and 1 colour television, 2/3 of the sample have 2+ televisions. The population of the Saughall Parish Church has risen through the years.Here are the population counts taken every decade:1961 = 2178, 1971 = 2426, 1981 = 3358.
